title: SignalK
description: Root schema of Signal K. Contains the list of vessels plus a reference to the local boat (also contained in the vessels list).

self.description: This holds the key (MMSI or other unique ID) of this vessel, the actual data is in the vessels array.

vessels.description: A wrapper object for vessel objects, each describing vessels in range, including this vessel.

(^urn:mrn:(imo|signalk):(mmsi:[2-7][0-9].description: This regex pattern is used for validation of an MMSI or Signal K UUID identifier for the vessel. Examples: urn:mrn:imo:mmsi:230099999 urn:mrn:signalk:uuid:c0d79334-4e25-4245-8892-54e8ccc8021d

resources.description: resources to aid in navigation and operation of the vessel
